member.name: T:BookPubDB.Model.Identity.LoginUser
member.summary: Represents a user entity for authentication and identity management.

member.name: P:BookPubDB.Model.Identity.LoginUser.Id
member.summary: Gets or sets the unique identifier for the user.

member.name: P:BookPubDB.Model.Identity.LoginUser.Login
member.summary: Gets or sets the username or login identifier for authentication.

member.name: P:BookPubDB.Model.Identity.LoginUser.Password
member.summary: Gets or sets the user's password. This property is masked for security.
